articles.title: CDC estimates 3 in 4 kids have had coronavirus infections - The Associated Press
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Three out of every four U.S. children have been infected with the coronavirus and more than half of all Americans had signs of previous infections, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention researchers estimated in a report Tuesday.
